text: Core of the CyberArk solution PrivateArk Server Service —< Manages storage and retrieval of secrets Allows remote control of target machines PrivateArk Remote Control Agent Service —< Ensures credentials are never exposed Manages internal CyberArk database PrivateArk Database Service —< /- Stores metadata, audit logs, etc. Vault Services B \ Sends notifications based on events CyberArk Event Notification Engine Service -< Alerts on privileged password access or changes Hardens the Windows environment CyberArk Hardened Windows Firewall Service —< Whitelists specific traffic to CyberArk Executes logic-based operations CyberArk Logic Container Service —< Runs scripts or workflows based on triggers
